thread.title: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. Announces Quarterly Common and Series A Preferred Stock Dividends

author: cnbc.com
title: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. Announces Quarterly Common and Series A Preferred Stock Dividends
text:
ATLANTA, March 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. (NYSE: IVR) its Board of Directors declared quarterly dividends on shares of its common stock and Series A preferred stock. Also, today the Company retired the remaining balance outstanding of its Exchangeable Senior Notes.
Common Stock Dividend
The Company's Board of Directors declared a cash dividend of $0.42 per share of common stock for the first quarter of 2018. The dividend will be paid on April 26, 2018 to stockholders of record on March 27, 2018, with an ex-dividend date of March 26, 2018.
Series A Preferred Stock Dividend
The Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend on its 7.75% Series A Cumulative Redeemable Preferred Stock of $0.4844 per share. The dividend will be paid on April 25, 2018 to stockholders of record on April 1, 2018, with an ex-dividend date of March 28, 2018.
About Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc.
Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. is a real estate investment trust that focuses on investing in, financing and managing residential and commercial mortgage-backed securities and mortgage loans. Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. is externally managed and advised by Invesco Advisers, Inc., a subsidiary of Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ), a leading independent global investment management firm. Additional information is available at www.invescomortgagecapital.com .
